Package ohos.agp.render

Class Vertices

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Vertices

  • public class Vertices
extends Object
    Provides methods for obtaining vertex information to draw triangles, including vertex modes, positions, texture coordinates and colors.
    Since:
    3

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Vertices​(int vertexCount, float[] verts, int vertOffset, float[] texs, int texOffset, int[] colors, int colorOffset, short[] indices, int indexOffset, int indexCount)
      A constructor used to create a Vertices instance based on the specified vertex information.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Obtains the offset within the array of vertex colors.

      Obtains the number of triangle indices.

      Obtains the offset within the array of triangle indices.

      Obtains an array of triangle indices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertices

        public Vertices​(int vertexCount,
                float[] verts,
                int vertOffset,
                float[] texs,
                int texOffset,
                int[] colors,
                int colorOffset,
                short[] indices,
                int indexOffset,
                int indexCount)
        A constructor used to create a Vertices instance based on the specified vertex information.
        Parameters:
        vertexCount - Indicates the number of vertices.
        verts - Indicates an array of vertex coordinates.
        vertOffset - Indicates the offset within the array of vertex coordinates.
        texs - Indicates an array of texture coordinates.
        texOffset - Indicates the offset within the array of texture coordinates.
        colors - Indicates an array of vertex colors.
        colorOffset - Indicates the offset within the array of vertex colors.
        indices - Indicates an array of triangle indices.
        indexOffset - Indicates the offset within the array of triangle indices.
        indexCount - Indicates the number of triangle indices.
        Since:
        3
